source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_00<tab>Cid's investigation in Terncliff has led to startling revelations.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_00<tab>ポルタ・プレトリアの解放軍の将校は、冒険者に知らせたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_01<tab>Returning to the camp at Porta Praetoria, the Resistance officer informs you that your presence is required in Terncliff. As always, your escort stands ready to accompany you on the journey.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
ガイウスは、ルビーウェポンの侵攻ルートを辿ることで、ウェポンの開発拠点がターンクリフの街であることを突き止めた。シドの新兵器「Gウォリアー」を用いた電撃戦により、ターンクリフ洋上にて待ち受けていたサファイアウェポンの破壊に成功。ターンクリフの街を、第VII軍団の支配から解放した。しかし、ルビーウェポン、サファイアウェポンに次ぐ新たな「ウェポン」は、孤児のひとりである「レックス」によって、ターンクリフから運び出されていたことが判明する。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
解放軍の将校と話した。ギラバニア湖畔地帯のポルタ・プレトリアの「解放軍の輸送兵」と話して、ターンクリフへ向かおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_02<tab>Terncliff is much the same as you remember from your previous visit, and while the imperial troops may be long gone, their enormous steel structures still mar the otherwise pleasant surroundings. Gaius and his associates have been made to wait for your arrival, as Cid would prefer to reveal his findings only when all of the relevant persons are present.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_02<tab>解放軍の輸送兵と話して、ターンクリフまで移動した。ウェルリトのターンクリフの「ガイウス」と話そう。ターンクリフを離れてしまった場合は、ポルタ・プレトリアにいる「解放軍の輸送兵」が、ターンクリフまで案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_03<tab>The investigation into the imperial facility in Terncliff has led to the discovery of the name of the VIIth Legion's third Weapon: Emerald. However, none of the locals have sighted anything resembling a large warmachina being moved from the town either by land or air. Though you cannot be certain, it seems likely that the Weapon was transported by sea, possibly to Castrum Marinum or Castrum Occidens in order to complete its construction. You and Gaius elect to investigate the former while Severa and Valdeaulin head for the latter. A member of the Ironworks has been ordered to prepare a submersible in Vesper Bay that you may make your approach.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_03<tab>ガイウスとともに、シドの調査結果を聞いた。格納庫に残されていた端末を解析した結果、ターンクリフにて、ルビーウェポン、サファイアウェポン、エメラルドウェポンの3機のウェポンが開発されていたことが判明したという。エメラルドウェポンは、水中でも行動できることがわかっており、搬出先はカストルム・オクシデンスと、カステッルム・マリヌムのどちらかである可能性が高いようだ。冒険者は、ガイウスとともにカステッルム・マリヌムを調べることになった。西ザナラーンのベスパーベイの「ガーロンド社の船員」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_04<tab>It appears that Gaius possesses a means of breaching the security system of Castrum Marinum and entering via the dry dock. Once you arrive, however, there is a fairly high chance that you will be greeted by the enigmatic Emerald Weapon, so you had best be prepared for the worst.

※Castrum Marinum can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_04<tab>ガーロンド社の船員と話した。カステッルム・マリヌムのドライドックに潜入し、「エメラルドウェポン破壊作戦」を攻略しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_05<tab>The confrontation with the Emerald Weapon called on every last onze of mettle you could muster, and once the dust had settled, it was you that emerged the victor. Overlooking the wreckage is Gaius, who mourns the loss of its pilot Rex, one of the orphans he raised.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_05<tab>エメラルドウェポン破壊作戦を攻略した。カステッルム・マリヌム・ドライドックの「ガイウス」と話そう。カステッルム・マリヌム・ドライドックを離れてしまった場合は、西ザナラーンの足跡の谷にいる「ガーロンド社の船員」が、カステッルム・マリヌム・ドライドックまで案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_06<tab>Following the battle, you are joined by Valdeaulin and Severa, whose mission to Castrum Occidens yielded little of value. After arriving in Castrum Marinum, they found Allie, another of Gaius's orphans, locked in a cell and decided to free her. She is filled with horror by the spectacle of the destroyed Emerald Weapon and descends into a state of shock. It seems the best recourse is to take her to Terncliff and allow her time to recover from the ordeal.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_06<tab>ガイウスは、孤児たちのひとり、レックスを救えなかったことを悔いているようだ。エメラルドウェポンのコアを通して、孤児たちの過去を視た。アルフォンスとレックスは、アリーをガイウスに保護させるために、営倉に幽閉していた。ターンクリフの「ガイウス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_07<tab>According to Severa, Allie's body is covered in welts and bruises that were most likely inflicted by the imperials under whom she served. Severa knows from personal experience the cruel treatment of those who are not pure-blooded Garleans, and she relates her tale of how she came to defect from the imperial army. Meanwhile, Allie continues to recuperate, and she may now be well enough to speak of what has befallen her and the other orphans, though it would be prudent to first discuss her current condition with Valdeaulin.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_07<tab>ガイウスと話した。アリーを看ていたセウェラの話によると、アリーの体には、属州人差別を受けたような暴行の跡があったという。セウェラも、ガレアン族とヒューランとの間に生まれたことから、属州人差別を受けて育ってきたらしい。どれだけ祖国のために尽くそうと戦い続けても、同胞として認められることはなく、敬愛する母親は、野蛮人扱いされた末に命を落としたと、セウェラは語る。ターンクリフの「ヴァルドラン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_08<tab>Allie has made great strides in recovering both physically and mentally, and is able to provide useful information on the present state of affairs and on Valens van Varro, legatus of the VIIth Legion. As she explains it, Valens is both jealous and cruel, and is willing to use any means at his disposal to achieve his goals, no matter how vile they may be. She also tells of Alfonse's dream of using the power granted to him by the Weapon project to break free from the Empire and establish a safe haven for those who wish to live in peace. Unfortunately, she is unable to say where he is, meaning that you will need to enlist the aid of the Alliance's scouts in locating him. With no immediate danger on the horizon, now seems an opportune time to return to the Resistance troops in Gyr Abania and report the latest series of events.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_08<tab>ヴァルドランと話した。アリーは、レックスの死を受け入れて、少し落ち着いた様子だった。彼女によると、エオルゼアの戦いでガイウスが行方不明になった直後、第VII軍団の再編が行われ、孤児たちはそこへ転属になったらしい。軍団を率いているのは、ウァレンスという純血主義の男。ウァレンスは、ガイウスに対して強い劣等感を持っているらしく、リットアティンのような属州人を重用したガイウスの行いを、嫌悪していたようだ。アルフォンスは、ウァレンスのような差別主義者を打ち倒し、差別のない自由な国を造ることを夢見ており、そのために、「ウェポン」の完成を目指しているという。ポルタ・プレトリアの「解放軍の将校」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_09<tab>Your report is gratefully received by the Resistance officer in charge at Porta Praetoria. He will prepare a written copy of the information that has been gathered, should you wish to review it before being called into action once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEQ_09<tab>解放軍の将校と話した。冒険者が伝えた内容は、報告書にまとめられて、エオルゼア同盟軍に提出されるようだ。興味があったら、報告書を覗き見てみるといいだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_001<tab>Ah, it's good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_001<tab>お待ちしておりました、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_002<tab>I'm pleased to report that Master Garlond and the others uncovered a fair bit of useful information at the imperial facility in Terncliff.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_002<tab>ウェルリト辺境のターンクリフにて、
放棄された帝国軍施設の調査にあたっていたシドさんから、
情報共有を行いたいと打診が入っております。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_003<tab>In fact, he'd like you to rendezvous with Gaius in the town square, where he'll reveal what they've found. Once you're ready to depart, your escort will lead the way.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_003<tab>現地に向かい、
ガイウス・バエサルと合流してもらいたいとのこと。
準備が出来次第、「解放軍の輸送兵」にお声がけください！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CONVEYOR03783_000_010<tab>All set for the journey ahead?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CONVEYOR03783_000_010<tab>ターンクリフまでは、私が責任を持ってお送りいたします！
どうかご安心を！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q2_000_000<tab>Travel to Terncliff?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q2_000_000<tab>「ターンクリフ」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_050<tab>Now that you are here, perhaps Cid will finally deign to dispense his findings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_050<tab>貴殿も、あの男に呼び出されたようだな。
到着したばかりですまないが、すぐにでも情報を聞くとしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_051<tab>Severa, inform him of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s arrival.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_051<tab>セウェラ……
シドに<var 08 E905 ((彼女)) ((彼)) /var>が到着したと伝えてきてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_052<tab>Thanks for coming.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_052<tab>待ってたぜ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_053<tab>So, what have you discovered?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_053<tab>さて、さっそくだが調査結果を共有してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_054<tab>To tell the truth, we were lucky to obtain any information at all, considering the lengths to which the imperials went in covering their tracks. You see, the hangar below was not just used to store the Weapons, but played a critical role in their creation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_054<tab>ああ、知ってのとおり、
この街の真下には、飛空艇用の格納庫があるんだが……
どうやら、そこを「ウェポン」の開発に利用していたらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_055<tab>We now know the code names given to three of the Weapons. Ruby, Sapphire...and Emerald.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_055<tab>残されていた端末を解析した結果、
3機の「ウェポン」の開発コードが判明した。
ルビー、サファイア、そして……エメラルドだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_056<tab>Obviously, we are all familiar with the first two, but the third is something of an unknown quantity.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_056<tab>ルビーウェポンとサファイアウェポンは、
英雄殿の活躍によって、すでに撃破されていますよね。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_057<tab>At the very least, this confirms the existence of another of those abominations.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_057<tab>つまり、残るエメラルドなるウェポン、
これを探し出すことが、次の目標になるわけですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_A1_000_001<tab>At the very least?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_A1_000_001<tab>何か問題が？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_A1_000_002<tab>What are we waiting for? Let's go after it!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_A1_000_002<tab>早く探しだして破壊しよう

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_059<tab>The problem lies in ascertaining its whereabouts. None of the locals have seen anything resembling a Weapon being transported either by land or air.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_059<tab>ターンクリフの住人に聞き込みを行ったが、
陸路、空路ともに大型兵器の搬出を目撃した者がおらぬのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_060<tab>Which of course leaves only one option: the sea. According to what fragmented data we were able to recover, the Emerald Weapon is equipped with aquatic capabilities, much like the Sapphire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_060<tab>その謎は解析で判明済みだ。
エメラルドは、前回戦ったサファイアと同様に、
水中での行動にも対応しているらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_061<tab>Meaning that its escape from Terncliff would have gone undetected, and could potentially be anywhere by now. But if Alfonse plans to have it absorb more primals...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_061<tab>海路か……これはやっかいだな。
アルフォンスらがウェポンに蛮神を喰わせることを、
狙っているとするならば…………

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_062<tab>...the logical choice would be Eorzea.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_062<tab>すでにエオルゼアへと向かっている可能性が高い。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_063<tab>And traveling by sea would allow him to circumvent the front line at Ghimlyt entirely! The Alliance must be alerted at once!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_063<tab>水の中を通られては、
ギムリトダークに敷いた防衛線も意味を成しませんね……。
急ぎ、エオルゼアへ戻りましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_064<tab>Hold your chocobos, Severa. It seems that the Emerald Weapon was still incomplete when the VIIth Legion withdrew from Terncliff.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_064<tab>まあ、落ち着け。
未調整の状態で運び出したエメラルドが完成するまでは、
連中が強襲を仕掛けてくる可能性は低い。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_065<tab>It's far more likely that it was transported to another facility in order to add the finishing touches.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_065<tab>おそらくは、エオルゼアのどこかの帝国基地に運び込み、
最終調整を続けているはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_066<tab>If your supposition is correct, that would narrow our search to but two possible locations: Castrum Marinum in the Rhotano Sea and Castrum Occidens in eastern La Noscea.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_066<tab>海に面していて、機能が生きている基地といえば、
ロータノ海上のカステッルム・マリヌムか、
東ラノシアのカストルム・オクシデンスだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_067<tab>Both of which are known to harbor remnants of the XIVth Legion...your former subordinates, Gaius.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_067<tab>どちらの基地にも、未だ第XIV軍団の残党兵が残っていて、
戦闘を避けずに調査するのは難しいと思われます。
かつての、貴方の部下たちがね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_068<tab>Be that as it may, our objective is unchanged. Valdeaulin, you and Severa will make your way to Castrum Occidens while <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I head for Castrum Marinum.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_068<tab>……ならば、二手にわかれて入りこむしかあるまい。
ヴァルドランとセウェラは、カストルム・オクシデンスを調査せよ。
我は英雄とともに、カステッルム・マリヌムに潜入する。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_069<tab>Should we locate the Emerald Weapon, we will give the signal to dispatch the G-Warrior and eliminate it before it can be activated.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_069<tab>つまり、エメラルドウェポンの在り処を明らかにしてから、
「Gウォリアー」を使って強襲を仕掛けるのですね！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_070<tab>Sorry to disappoint you, but we're still repairing the damage it sustained during the encounter with the Sapphire Weapon. While Allagan machinery has its uses, it's a bugger to find replacement parts in a pinch...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_070<tab>いや、すまないが、それは無理だ。
前回の戦闘のダメージが深刻でな、
元がアラグの遺物だけに、補修部品を用意するのも一苦労なんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_100_070<tab>We've actually been working to expand its already impressive arsenal, but the G-Warrior itself is in no fit state for combat.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_100_070<tab>これを機に追加装備の開発も検討しているんだが……
今回の作戦には間に合いそうもない。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_071<tab>While I'm aware this is a far from adequate replacement, I can provide an Ironworks submersible to help <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Gaius reach Castrum Marinum. I'll have one sent ahead to Vesper Bay.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_071<tab>代わりと言っては何だが、
海から潜入するために潜水艦を用意させよう。
うちの社員に連絡して、ベスパーベイに手配させる。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_072<tab>A submersible, eh? I don't much like the sound of that. Perhaps Severa and I should count ourselves fortunate that our destination can be approached by land. I pray you have a safe journey. Watch yourself out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_072<tab>では、私たちは東ラノシアへ向かいます。
英雄殿、お気をつけて。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_073<tab>It is time we departed. Let us make our way to Vesper Bay.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_073<tab>では、我らも発つとしよう。
合流地点、「ベスパーベイ」へ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_075<tab>It seems that Cid is not in the habit of saying the same thing twice, which must be why he has been waiting for you to arrive before revealing the results of his investigation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_075<tab>シド殿が、新たな情報を手に入れたようだ。
まずは「ガイウス」様と話してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_080<tab>Though the imperials may be gone, the scars they have left on this once-peaceful town will doubtless take many years to heal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_080<tab>穏やかな街だと思いませんか？
つい先日まで、帝国によって占領されていたとは、
思えないくらいですよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_090<tab>I wouldn't mind going with you to Terncliff, but I've got to stay here to keep an eye on this horrible lot!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_090<tab>ターンクリフに向かう際は、
「解放軍の輸送兵」にお声がけください！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CONVEYOR03783_000_95<tab>All set for the journey ahead?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CONVEYOR03783_000_95<tab>ターンクリフまでは、私が責任を持ってお送りいたします！
どうかご安心を！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q2_000_096<tab>Travel to Terncliff?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q2_000_096<tab>「ターンクリフ」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_100<tab>As per Master Garlond's instructions, the submersible is ready when you are!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_100<tab>社長から聞いています。
潜水艦の準備は万端ですよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_100_100<tab>But before you depart, I've received some scraps of intelligence regarding your opponent from my colleagues in Terncliff.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_100_100<tab>それと、端末に残されていたデータを解析して、
エメラルドウェポンに搭載されている武装の一部が判明しました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_200_100<tab>Apparently, it uses some sort of levitating...handlike appendages─six of them, in fact─though we're not quite sure what purpose they serve. It sounds like having eyes in the back of your head might come in handy. But that's all we know, I'm afraid.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_200_100<tab>どうやらエメラルドウェポンは、
6本の腕を分離し、攻撃端末として操ることで、
全方位攻撃を可能としているようです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_101<tab>You have our thanks. After all, forewarned is forearmed. If the Emerald Weapon has indeed been transported to this castrum, it would need to enter via the dry dock. We shall do likewise.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_101<tab>協力に感謝する……。
カステッルム・マリヌムにウェポンが隠されているとすれば、
最下層にある艦船用のドライドックであろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_102<tab>As one might expect, there are measures in place to keep out intruders, but the security systems can be tricked into recognizing us as an imperial vessel.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_102<tab>我が帝国軍の高官用通信コードを用いれば、
味方を装って、内部へと侵入することは容易いはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_102<tab>That said, infiltrating the facility is merely the first step...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_102<tab>問題は、こちらにエメラルドウェポンが格納されていて、
起動阻止に失敗した場合だが……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_103<tab>Should the Emerald Weapon be activated, it is only a matter of time before the pilot uses Oversoul.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_103<tab>おそらく、いざ戦闘となれば、
彼らはオーバーソウルモードなるものを使うことを厭わぬだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_104<tab>We must silence the warmachina before this happens, and failing that, grant the poor soul at its helm the mercy of a swift death.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_104<tab>……彼らには、戦ってほしくも死してほしくもない。
だが、最悪の状況を想定しておくべきとも理解はしている。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_105<tab>Had these wounds healed more quickly, I could have gone with you, but I fear I would only slow you down. As such, I shall provide what support I can from afar. Whatever happens, the Emerald Weapon must be defeated at all costs.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_105<tab>我も負傷した身ではあるが、
出来得る限りの情報支援はさせてもらう。
危険な役回りを押し付けてすまないが……頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_110<tab>In the event that my attempt to bypass the castrum's security fails, this submersible of Cid's had best be able to withstand imperial weaponry long enough for us to escape.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_110<tab>この者が、シドの部下であろう。
しかし、潜水艦を用意してみせるとは……
エオルゼアの技術力も、侮れないものだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_150<tab>I'm sorry we weren't able to provide any further details on the target. We can only guess what other tricks it might have in store for you. Be careful out there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_150<tab>エメラルドウェポンは、
6本の腕を分離し、攻撃端末として操ることで、
全方位攻撃を可能としているようです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_155<tab>Though I would prefer that we avoid engaging my former wards in combat, we cannot allow my sentiments to prevent us from doing what must be done.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_155<tab>むろん、レックスには戦ってほしくも死してほしくもない。
が、最悪の状況を想定しておくべきとも理解はしている。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_200<tab>And so it ends.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_200<tab>我の戦闘データまで使って、なぜだ……レックス……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_201<tab>But why would Rex throw away his life...for this!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_201<tab>なぜ自らの命を捨て石にしてまで、
お前たちはウェポンの開発計画を進めようというのだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_202<tab>You are right... If I am ever to learn the truth, I must concentrate on the task at hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_202<tab>……わかっておる、
今は感傷に浸っている場合ではない……。
すまぬ、貴殿には、またも大きな苦労をかけた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_202<tab>Of course, we do not need to wait for Cid's analysis to tell us whose combat data was used on this occasion.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_202<tab>シドが調べるまでもなく、
あの機体に搭載されていたのは、我の戦闘データだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_200_202<tab>It galls me to think that my techniques and strategies could be so closely replicated. Nevertheless, the observations I made during the battle may yet prove useful. As a matter of fact, that was not the only information I was able to gather.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_200_202<tab>エメラルドウェポンが使用していた剣技、
「ターミナス・エスト」は、我が編み出した技だからな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_203<tab>I intercepted a signal that revealed the troops stationed here were permitted to withdraw, seemingly in return for assisting the VIIth Legion. They must have known that the Alliance would follow the Emerald Weapon here sooner or later and made good their escape.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_203<tab>通信を傍受したところ、施設内にもう兵はいないようだ。
第VII軍団に協力する見返りとして、エオルゼアからの脱出を、
手引してもらった、といったところか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_204<tab>Meaning the way is now clear for Cid to inspect the warmachina's remains.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_204<tab>つまり、この施設は安全だ。
シドらを呼び寄せ、残骸を調査しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_205<tab>We got here as soon as we could.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_205<tab>待たせたな。
無事のようで安心したぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_100_205<tab>Not that we could've done anything to prevent this tragedy.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_100_205<tab>こっちに格納されていやがったか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_206<tab>From what we know, it seems that the Emerald Weapon was ilm for ilm a great deal more powerful than the previous two. If this is allowed to continue, who knows what sort of monstrosity the VIIth Legion will conceive next.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_206<tab>ひと目見ただけでも、先の2機と比べて、
出力が強化されていることがわかる。
完成度が高まってきている証拠だろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_207<tab>Nevertheless, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has once again proven <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> capable of overcoming the worst the Empire has at its disposal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_207<tab>それでも勝ってみせるんだから、
さすがは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>だな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_208<tab>You may be relieved to hear that Castrum Occidens was free of anything resembling a Weapon. Unfortunately, it was also devoid of any useful leads, and we came away empty-handed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_208<tab>カストルム・オクシデンスをくまなく探ってきましたが、
あちらには、ウェポンシリーズらしきものの手がかりは、
まるで……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_209<tab>In all honesty, part of me wishes we had never found the Emerald Weapon. Perhaps then, Rex would not have been forced to make the ultimate sacrifice. I only hope that he is finally at peace...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_209<tab>エメラルドウェポンに搭乗していたのは、レックス……。
やはり、我が身元を引き受けた孤児たちのひとりだ。
三度に渡り、救うことができぬとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_210<tab>We will do what we can to spare others from sharing his fate. I and the Ironworks will search this place from top to bottom for clues as to the VIIth Legion's plans.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_210<tab>悔やんでいても仕方がない。
いまオレたちがやるべきことは、この基地を調べて、
次に繋がる情報を探すことだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_211<tab>Before that, allow me to sweep the area for booby traps and the like. I would not put it past the imperials to have left a few surprises for us...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_211<tab>念には念を……
罠の類がないか施設内を徹底的に調べてみます。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_212<tab>Agreed. I'll go with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_212<tab>私も手を貸しましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_213<tab>With that in mind, I'll begin my examination of the Emerald Weapon. Carefully, that is.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_213<tab>さてと……まずは「エメラルドウェポン」を調べてみるか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_251<tab>Alfonse! You knew all this time, didn't you!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_251<tab>兄さん、どうして黙っていたの！
パイロットがコアと一体化してしまう機能が、
ウェポンに備わっていることを！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_252<tab>Milisandia and Ricon, too... Everyone except me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_252<tab>知らなかったのは、私だけ？
ミリサンディアとリコンは知っていたの？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_253<tab>And you, Rex?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_253<tab>レックス、あなたも知っていたんでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_254<tab>Yes. That's what the synthetic auracite system <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var>. The fusion between pilot and core is the key to Oversoul.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_254<tab>みんな、知っていたさ……知識としてはな。
オーバーソウルモードを使えば、コアとの融合率が高まって、
パイロットは元には戻れなくなっちまう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_255<tab>And unless we use it, we don't have a chance of beating Father's newfound friends. They stand between us and the primals, without which the Weapons will never reach their full potential. We thought that if you knew the truth about Oversoul, you'd try to stop us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_255<tab>だが、オーバーソウルモードを使わずに、
義父上たちを退け、蛮神の力を吸収させるなんて不可能だ。
そんなこと聞いたら、お前は止めるだろ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_256<tab>Of course I would! But what I don't understand is why all of you are so willing to give your lives for the Weapon project. What is it all for!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_256<tab>どうして……！
ふたりを犠牲にしてまで、
「ウェポン」を完成させなければならないの！？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_257<tab>It all began the day Father left. Without his guidance, his protection, the Garleans lost any respect they once had for us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_257<tab>義父上がいた頃と違って、もはやこの国には、
私たちの居場所はなくなってしまった。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_258<tab>But their cruelty pales in comparison to Valens. To him, conscripts like us are expendable commodities, an endless supply of test subjects for his twisted experiments.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_258<tab>第VII軍団長のウァレンスにとって、
属州人である私たちは、
いくらでも代わりがいる実験台に過ぎない。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_259<tab>But no matter what they do to us, we will never lose hope. If it is the duty of the strong to lead the weak, we will become strong and protect those who cannot protect themselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_259<tab>だが、私たちには大義がある。
あの機体……究極のウェポンを完成させるという、大義がな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_260<tab>The Weapon project will give us the strength we need. We will create a world where people like us can live without fear of persecution.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_260<tab>私たちは、その力を使って、
「もう誰も苦しまなくていい世界」を創る……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_261<tab>We want you to see this new world for yourself, Allie. Even if we must give our lives to make it a reality.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_261<tab>だから、アリー……
お前は先に平和な世界で待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_262<tab>But...why me?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_262<tab>兄さん……何を言っているの？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_263<tab>The years spent serving the Empire have changed us all...except you, Allie. Even after everything you've seen, you're still the caring, innocent girl we grew up with. More than any of us, you deserve a chance at happiness. That's what we all agreed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_263<tab>ウェポンの実験台に選ばれた時から、兄妹で話し合って決めたんだ。
オレや、先に逝ったミリサンディア、リコン、
全員が、お前を守りたいと思っているのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_264<tab>Allie, listen to me. Right now, the soldiers assigned to watch over us have been called away to the capital. Now is our chance to get you out of here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_264<tab>いつも私たちを監視しているウァレンス直属の部下は、
帝都ガレマルドの偵察に回されていて、ここにはいない。
お前を逃がすなら、今しかないのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_265<tab>Then why don't you come with me!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_265<tab>そんな……逃げるなら、ふたりも一緒に……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_266<tab>If Alfonse and I were to run away now, they'd only force others to take our place. We can't let that happen.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_266<tab>オレたちが逃げれば、別の属州人が犠牲になっちまう。
ヤツにとって属州人は、替えが効く消耗品に過ぎないんだ。
ウェポン開発のためなら、何人だって使い捨てるさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_267<tab>This is our way of upholding the ideals Father instilled in us. Our lives are a small price to pay for Werlyt's freedom.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_267<tab>強者が弱者を導く先にこそ、未来がある……。
戦う力を持たないウェルリトの同胞たちのために、
オレたちが、やらなきゃいけないんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_268<tab>No! How can you expect me to leave you behind!? I won't do it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_268<tab>もうこれ以上、家族がいなくなるのは嫌だよ……。
レックス、兄さん……私をひとりにしないで……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_269<tab>We will forever be at your side, Allie.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_269<tab>たとえ、私たちがいなくなっても……
アリー、お前はひとりじゃない。
私たちの想いは、いつでもお前の心と共にある。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_269<tab>Rex, take her to the holding cells.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_269<tab>レックス、アリーを営倉に。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_270<tab>No! Let me go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_270<tab>嫌……！！
レックス！　兄さん！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_271<tab>So win or lose, the plan is to hand over the castrum to Father, is that right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_271<tab>戦闘の勝敗に関わらず、
義父上たちには、このドライドックを明け渡せばいいんだろ？
アリーを保護させるためによ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_272<tab>Yes. They'll take Allie into their custody before the Garleans return, while you will be free to pilot the Emerald Weapon without her interfering. We can't let her hinder the completion of the Weapon project.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_272<tab>ウァレンスは、アリーを使って何かを企んでいるようだった。
これで、何の憂いもなく、あの機体の完成を目指すことができる。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_273<tab>I'm counting on you, Alfonse. Don't let our sacrifices be in vain.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_273<tab>そのために、オレはエメラルドに乗って戦う。
お前は、アリーと生きて、優しい国を造ってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_274<tab>Rex, have you forgotten what I told you? You mustn't use Oversoul! I can't lose you too...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_274<tab>……レックス。
オーバーソウルモードを使わなければ……
お前が命を落とすことは……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_275<tab>We both know I can't win without it. Besides, we need the combat data of the Emerald Weapon fighting at its peak if we're to have any chance of perfecting the synthetic auracite system. You know I'm not the sort to do things by halves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_275<tab>あの機能なしで戦えるほど、やわな相手じゃないって、
さっき話したばかりじゃねえか。
今さらブレるなんて、らしくないぜ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_276<tab>Forgive me, Rex.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_276<tab>…………すまない。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_277<tab>Don't you worry about me. If this is where I meet my end, I'll do it with a smile on my face. The rest is up to you, Alfonse!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_REX_000_277<tab>おいおい、頼むぜ！
アルフォンスのアニキよぉ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_278<tab>This is the girl you spoke of, yes? She was locked in a cell, but I saw no harm in letting her out. I can't say for certain, but it seems she's been through quite an ordeal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_278<tab>彼女は、アリー……と言いましたか。
営倉に幽閉されていたようです。
何があったのか、とても憔悴している様子で……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_279<tab>No...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_279<tab>そんな……レックス……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_279<tab>Why, Rex!? Why!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_279<tab>嫌ぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_280<tab>...Gaius, once we've extracted the core, we'll take it back to Terncliff for analysis.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_280<tab>ターンクリフの格納庫になら、
こいつのコアを解析するための設備も整っている。
運び出す準備ができたら、戻るぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_281<tab>Perhaps she should come with us? There's no use in her staying here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_281<tab>彼女にとっても、
ここは長居するには辛い場所だろう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_285<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_CID_000_285<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_290<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_290<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_295<tab>We're still carrying out our search of Castrum Marinum. Would you like to take a look for yourself?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_GSPILOT03980_000_295<tab>エメラルドウェポンの調査は、まだ終わっていません。
「カステッルム・マリヌム・ドライドック」へ向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q3_000_000<tab>Enter Castrum Marinum?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_Q3_000_000<tab>「カステッルム・マリヌム・ドライドック」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_300<tab>Severa is taking care of Allie, but it may be some time until her nerves have settled.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_300<tab>アリーは、セウェラが看ている。
ひどく動揺しているようであったからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_301<tab>If the vision you witnessed is indeed true, Alfonse and Rex locked her away for her own safety.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_301<tab>ここまでの移動中に貴殿から聞いた話によれば、
アルフォンスとレックスは、妹の命だけは守らんと、
アリーを我に託した……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_302<tab>When she is ready, I would know more of what her brother hopes to achieve and why he must resort to such desperate measures.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_302<tab>あやつらが、そうまでしてやり遂げようとすることとは何か、
アリーが落ち着いたら、話を聞けるとよいが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_303<tab>Allie's condition has improved somewhat, but she remains in a state of shock. We must give her more time to recover.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_303<tab>アリーは、まだ少し混乱した様子が見られますが、
徐々に落ち着きを取りもどしています。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_304<tab>There was one other thing that I thought you should know... When we checked her for injuries, we saw that her back is covered in welts and bruises.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_304<tab>それよりも気がかりなのは……
身体検査時に判明したのですが、服の下に、
暴行を受けたような痣が多くあったことです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_305<tab>Who did this to her!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_305<tab>痣……だと？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_306<tab>It seems she was subjected to beatings on a regular basis, judging by the varied stages of bruising. I daresay this was the work of her Garlean masters.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_306<tab>これは、私の推測に過ぎませんが……もしかすると彼女……
いえ、彼女たちは、属州人差別に遭っていたのではないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_307<tab>You speak as though you have seen this before...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_307<tab>なぜ、そう思う？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_308<tab>Seen? I have lived through it myself.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_308<tab>……かつては、私も同じ境遇にあったからです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_309<tab>I was born in Werlyt, twenty-three summers past.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_309<tab>いまから23年前……私は、ここウェルリトで生まれました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_310<tab>My mother was a local woman, but my father was a pure-blooded Garlean and a member of the occupying forces.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_310<tab>支配者として君臨していたガレアン族の男が、
現地人の女性に産ませた子ども……それが私です。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_311<tab>Though I know very little about him, his rank afforded me imperial citizenship. His acknowledgement of our familial ties was the extent of the responsibility he took for bringing me into this world. Still, it is more than can be said for most of his ilk...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_311<tab>官僚だった父のおかげで、
私も帝国市民権をもっていましたが……
それでもなお、幼い頃から様々な差別を受けてきました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_312<tab>My mother and I were shunned by the people of Werlyt, who treated us as badly as the Garleans did, if not worse. I thought that if I were to become an imperial soldier, my position might somehow deter those who would cast scorn on my mother, if only out of fear. And so I joined the army.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_312<tab>保身のために身を売ったのだと罵られる母を守るため、
私は模範的な帝国人となるべく、軍人となったのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_313<tab>The acceptance I earned was but temporary, however, and my superiors were quick to blame any perceived shortcomings on my “savage” lineage. Rather than waste time on official court-martials, they administered their own form of corporal punishment.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_313<tab>軍功を上げれば、「帝国人」と認められることもありましたが、
一方で、失敗した時には「野蛮人」としてなじられる。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_314<tab>I was eventually assigned to the XIIth Legion and fought under Zenos yae Galvus in Ala Mhigo. In the chaos that followed our defeat, I seized the opportunity to flee to Werlyt.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_314<tab>ゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァスの第XII軍団に所属していた私は、
アラミゴの戦いで、エオルゼア同盟軍に敗れた後、
ウェルリトまで逃げ帰りました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_315<tab>While it was never much of a home, it was all I had. But nothing could prepare me for what awaited...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_315<tab>しかし、私を待っていたのは絶望でした……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_316<tab>My mother had for many years suffered from poor health and relied on medicine to keep her alive. In my absence, the Garleans had denied her treatment, claiming that it would be wasted on savages. By the time I could return to her side, there was naught I could do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_316<tab>母が衰弱死していたのです。
帝位争いの混乱で、本国からの物資が滞る中、
野蛮人に与える薬はないと、持病の薬を受け取れなかったのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_317<tab>There was nothing left for me in Werlyt. I would be punished for desertion if the imperials discovered the reason for my return, and I was never accepted by my so-called countrymen to begin with.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_317<tab>さらに私自身も、惨めな敗者として誹謗中傷にさらされ……
同胞として扱ってくれない「祖国」とは何なのかと、
考えるようになりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_318<tab>I ran as far as my legs could carry me. It was then that I met Gaius.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_318<tab>そうして、戦意を失っていった私は、
軍からの脱走を企て、ガイウス様と出会ったのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_319<tab>So that is the truth of it... Other than a few scant details, I knew naught of your past. It sickens me to think that I once fought under the same banner as such vile creatures.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_319<tab>第XII軍団の敗残兵と知ってはいたが、
そのような経緯があったとはな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_320<tab>I had always believed it to be the duty of the strong to lead the weak. Yet there are those who become drunk on the power afforded by their station, and prey on the ones they should protect.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_320<tab>強者に求められる役割は、
弱者を痛めつけることではなく、導くことだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_321<tab>Like a canker, this corruption has spread to every part of the Empire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_321<tab>かようなこともわからぬ愚者たちが、
帝国には蔓延っているということか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_322<tab>Even those with Garlean blood, such as myself, are subjected to their cruelty. They hold particular contempt for the Au Ra, an easy target for abuse being so few in number. Perhaps, like me, Allie thought she would be spared such treatment once she joined the army. Alas...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_322<tab>ガレアン族の血を半分引く私でさえ、そうだったのです。
ウェルリト人の中でも、さらに少数なアウラ族の孤児の身体に、
訓練のものとは思えぬ傷があったとしたら……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_323<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_323<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_324<tab>I only hope that with time, Allie can put the past behind her and make a new life for herself. But for now, all we can do is wait for her delirium to subside. It is Valdeaulin's turn to keep watch. Let us ask him if there has been any change.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_324<tab>そろそろ、アリーも落ち着いた頃でしょう。
私の話はこれぐらいにして、彼女の様子を見に行きましょう。
「ヴァルドラン」が警護してくれているはずです。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_350<tab>I suppose you're here to ask about Allie.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_350<tab>アリーの様子を見に来たのですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_351<tab>Is she well enough to speak with us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_351<tab>うむ。
話はできそうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_352<tab>As her condition has improved somewhat, I would say so, provided you do not cause her any undue distress. Wait here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_352<tab>短時間であれば問題ないでしょう。
少し待っていてください。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_353<tab>Allie... I am sorry. What happened to Rex...it was my fault.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_353<tab>アリー……。
レックスのことは、残念に思っている……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_354<tab>Milisandia, and Ricon, too... They died because of me and my foolish ambitions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_354<tab>……いや、レックスだけではない。
ミリサンディアと、リコン……
お前たち兄妹を救えなかったことを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_355<tab>Father, no...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_355<tab>義父上……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_356<tab>This cannot go on. Please, Allie. You must tell me all you know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_356<tab>これ以上、お前たちの誰かが命を落とすのを見たくはない。
話を聞かせてはくれぬか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_357<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_357<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_357<tab>Of course.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_357<tab>……わかった。
私も、義父上に話を聞いてほしかったから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_358<tab>First, I need to know what became of you and your siblings after we were parted.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_358<tab>では、まず……
お前たちが現在置かれている状況について、教えてほしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_359<tab>So much has happened, it seems like a lifetime ago... After your disappearance, we were all assigned to the newly reformed VIIth Legion.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_359<tab>何から話せばいいか……
義父上が、エオルゼアの戦いで行方不明になった直後、
第VII軍団の再編が行われ、私たちはそこに転属になったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_360<tab>At first, each legatus was quickly replaced by the next, until eventually, a man named Valens van Varro was given command.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_360<tab>その後も混乱が続いて、軍団長の交代が繰り返され……
最終的には、ウァレンスという男が着任したの。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_361<tab>He was sent from the capital, but before that, he was a specialist in experimental magitek weaponry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_361<tab>皇都から派遣されてきたというウァレンスは、
試作魔導兵器と、その開発チームを従えてやってきた。
それが「ウェポン」シリーズ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_362<tab>We later discovered that he was ordered by Emperor Varis to complete a project involving anti-primal warmachina: the Weapons... But after the Emperor's death, he was free to employ whatever methods he saw fit, and his greed for power only grew.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_362<tab>ヴァリス陛下からの命令で、
帝国独自の対蛮神兵器を完成させる密命を帯びていたの。
でも、その陛下が亡くなったことで、彼は暴走を始めた。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_363<tab>Some even say he is planning to use the power of the Weapons to lay claim to the throne.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_363<tab>究極の力を持ったウェポンを完成させ、
あわよくば皇帝の座を我が物に……と。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_364<tab>But I think there's another reason for his obsession with the Weapon project. Not that he'd ever tell anyone, but he's always muttering to himself, and I've been able to put the pieces together.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_364<tab>でも……私が思うに、
ウァレンスがウェポンの開発を始めた理由は別にある。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_365<tab>He's jealous of you, Father.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_365<tab>彼はガイウス・ヴァン・バエサル……
つまり、義父上に、強い劣等感を持っている……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_366<tab>Valens van Varro... I must admit, it was only recently that I first heard that name.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_366<tab>我にだと？
だが、ウァレンス……聞かぬ名だな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_367<tab>Valens used his knowledge of magitek to devise various military strategies. He was given a position in the army and quickly rose through the ranks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_367<tab>元々、魔導技術者でもあったウァレンスは、
魔導技術を積極的に取り込んだ作戦の立案が評価され、
軍内で出世街道を歩んでいた。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_367<tab>That was until one man stood in his way─ You, Father.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_367<tab>でも、その先には、自分を超える才能が……
ガイウス・バエサルがいた。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_200_367<tab>He was one of the candidates to lead the new XIVth Legion, but that role fell to you. After that, he was assigned to serve under a far more gifted engineer, Nero, who was in charge of restoring the Ultima Weapon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_200_367<tab>新設された第XIV軍団の軍団長に、義父上が抜擢されたこと。
さらに魔導技師としても優秀なネロ幕僚長を配下につけ、
アルテマウェポンを手に入れたこと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_300_367<tab>Valens has resented you ever since, going so far as to oppose the ideals you upheld. Where you treated those who serve the Empire based on merit rather than on their race or origin, Valens is adamant that pure-blooded Garleans are superior to all others.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_300_367<tab>次々と自分の上を行く義父上を、憎み続けた。
実力ある属州人を重用する義父上に対抗して、
本国で「純血主義」とかいう論文を発表するほどに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_368<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_368<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_100_368<tab>It never ceases to amaze me how far some will go in the name of revenge. All that hatred, festering away... Nothing good could ever come of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_100_368<tab>それでは、完全な逆恨みではないか。
嫉妬心に駆られた人間ほど、恐ろしいものはないな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_369<tab>So the marks on your body are his handiwork?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_369<tab>では、お前の身体にあるという痣とは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_370<tab>...Yes. To Valens and his men, we are no more than fodder for his experiments, playthings on which they can vent their frustrations. Every day is filled with nothing but pain...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_370<tab>義父上には知られたくはなかった……
そう……ウァレンスたち差別主義者にやられたんだ。
彼らは、私たちのことを消耗品としか思っていないから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_371<tab>If I had remained in Garlemald, you would never have been forced to endure this abuse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_371<tab>すまぬ……まさか、お前たちが、
そのような状況に身を置かれていようとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_371<tab>It's not your fault, Father. We could've fled from Valens if we'd wanted to. After all, we're expendable and easily replaced. The truth is, that's exactly why we <var 1A 02 /var>couldn't<var 1A 01 /var> run.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_371<tab>謝らないで、義父上。
本気で脱走しようと思えば、できていたはずだもの……。
私たちは、自分の意思でウァレンスのもとに残ると決めたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_372<tab>In saving ourselves, we would be condemning others. But if we were to stay, to see the Weapon project to its completion, we would gain the power to defeat Valens, and then the Empire itself, freeing the world from its tyranny.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_372<tab>私たちが逃げ出せば、別の属州人がまた「部品」にされるだけ。
それなら私たちの手でウェポンを完成させ、その力を使って、
ウァレンスや帝国を倒し、差別のない自由な国を造る……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_373<tab>That way, we might start afresh, and find a place we can call home. And not just for us, but for anyone who wishes to live in peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_373<tab>義父上がいなくなって、居場所を失った私たちが、
笑顔で暮らすことのできる場所を……。
それが、兄さんたちを突き動かした「理想」なの……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_374<tab>You would give your lives for a future you may not live to see...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_374<tab>そのために……お前たちは、命をなげうって戦ってきたのか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_375<tab>We took courage from your teachings, Father. The strong must lead the weak, and we would gain that strength by whatever means necessary. We will fight for the sake of those who cannot.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_375<tab>ミリサンディアも、レックスも、リコンも。
兄さんの理想と「強者が弱者を導く先にこそ、未来がある」という、
義父上の言葉を信じて、命がけで戦ったんだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_376<tab>But we knew that you'd never consent to our participation in the Weapon project, which is why we couldn't turn to you for help.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_376<tab>もちろん、自分たちを犠牲にするようなやり方を、
義父上は許さないだろうとは、わかっていたけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_377<tab>As the pilots, we're the only ones who are able to stop Valens. We know just how powerful the Weapons are. He would use them to bring the world to its knees.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_377<tab>あまりに強力すぎるウェポンという兵器を、
あのウァレンスに、好きに使わせていいわけがない……。
彼を止められるのは、私たちだけだったから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_378<tab>And his “masterpiece” is the worst of them all...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_378<tab>特に、あのI号機は……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_378<tab>If only I could get my hands on it... Then I could save Alfonse and all of Werlyt!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_378<tab>そう……あの力があれば……。
兄さんとウェルリトは、私が救ってみせる……！
もうこれ以上、家族や同胞を傷つけさせはしない……！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_379<tab>Father, I know you and Alfonse stand on opposing sides of this conflict, but there must be some way you can help him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_379<tab>……義父上、もしもアルフォンス兄さんを助けることができたら、
協力してあげてほしいな……兄さんが目指す、理想の国造りを。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_380<tab>He may have called you our enemy before, but he never meant it. He still loves you, Father. You are everything he aspires to be.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_380<tab>ギムリトでは、義父上のことを敵だなんて言っていたけど、
兄さんは、今でもガイウス・バエサルに憧れているんだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_381<tab>I have failed him. Failed you all.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_381<tab>そうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_382<tab>But I refuse to abandon him to his fate. I will free him from Valens, if it is the last thing I do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_382<tab>わかった……約束しよう、アルフォンスを必ず救うと。
そして、これまで辛い思いをしてきたお前たちが、
安心して暮らすことのできる場所を造ろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_383<tab>Thank you... He needs you. Now more than ever.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_383<tab>ありがとう、義父上……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_383<tab>Listen, Allie. I once sought the strength to rebuild the world as I saw fit. But the Ultima Weapon was born not to create, but to destroy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_100_383<tab>……かつては、我も同じ過ちを犯した。
アルテマウェポンの力にすがり、
支配という名の平和をもたらさんとした……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_200_383<tab>Alfonse must not follow in my footsteps. I know all too well where they lead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_200_383<tab>故にこそ、誤った道を進もうとしている、
アルフォンスを救いたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_384<tab>I will do all I can to help your brother. Pray, tell me where he is.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_384<tab>だが、そのためには、情報が必要だ。
教えてくれ、アリー。
お前の兄は、いまどこにいるのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_385<tab>He's...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_385<tab>それは……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_386<tab>I'm sorry. I don't know where he could be.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_000_386<tab>ごめんなさい、わからないの……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_387<tab>In that case, I shall have the Alliance dispatch scouts. Wherever he is, we will find him. As for you, Allie, you must stay here and rest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_387<tab>そうか……ならば、同盟軍にも協力を要請して、
徹底的に捜索するほかあるまい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_386<tab>Wait... You're the one who fought Rex, Ricon, and Milisandia, aren't you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_100_386<tab>エオルゼアの英雄……
あなたが、私の義兄姉たちを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_200_386<tab>We're the ones who threatened your homeland. You only did what you had to do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_200_386<tab>いえ……エオルゼアへ攻め入ったのは、私たち……
あなたはあなたの、成すべきことを成しただけ……。
怨んではいない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_300_386<tab>I have no right to ask this of you, but...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_300_386<tab>英雄さん……
私は、あなたにお願いをできる立場ではないけど……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_400_386<tab>Lend my father your strength. Save Alfonse.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_400_386<tab>この先に、何が待ち受けていたとしても……
義父上、そしてアルフォンス兄さんの力になってあげてほしい……。
それは、もう私たちには叶わないことだから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_500_386<tab>...I know now why they call you “hero.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_500_386<tab>ありがとう、英雄さん……。
厳しい役回りを押しつけてしまって、ごめんなさい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_600_386<tab>Alfonse, I'll do what I must to free you, even if it means going against Father's wishes. But I have a good feeling about his new friend...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALLIE_600_386<tab>私は、アルフォンス兄さんを救うために、
これから義父上を裏切ることになる……。
でも、この人がそばにいてくれれば、きっと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_388<tab>Severa, see that she has everything she needs.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_388<tab>セウェラ、アリーを休ませてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_389<tab>Our allies must be informed of these troubling events. May I ask you to relay this news to the troops in Gyr Abania?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_389<tab>貴殿は、一度ギラバニアへと戻り、
これまでのことを同盟軍に報告してもらえるだろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_390<tab>Your “loving father” act may fool the others, Gaius, but not me. For every life you've saved, you've ended a thousand more. Or is this your idea of redemption?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_390<tab>あの孤児たちのことになると、随分と必死じゃないか……。
過去、5つの都市を滅ぼした男とは思えぬくらいだ。
罪滅ぼしのつもりか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_391<tab>Call it what you will. For all my transgressions, I believe I still have a part to play.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_391<tab>死者は生者を許しはしない。
ただ、生きている者を救いたいと願うだけだ。
それを偽善と呼びたくば、好きにするがいい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_392<tab>Was I wrong to spare you that day? Or will you honor your word? ...It seems the time has come for the Black Wolf to show his true colors.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_392<tab>ガレアン族に善き心などあるはずがない……。
あるはずがないのだ……。
そうでなければ、私は……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_395<tab>Though you have overcome the Emerald Weapon, it is hardly cause for celebration. Another young life cut short...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_395<tab>エメラルドウェポンの脅威を払えたことは喜ぶべきだろう。
あなたも、危険を顧みず、よくぞ戦い抜いてくれた。
だが、ガイウス様の心中を思うと複雑だな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_400<tab>Rex's death is on my hands, not yours. Would that this confrontation had been averted, but alas, it was not to be.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_400<tab>戦い、倒さねばならなかった……。
そして、彼らの生死に向き合うべきは、貴殿ではなく我だ。
そのことだけは覚えておいてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_450<tab>We recently received word of your victory over the Emerald Weapon. I expect it was another fine display on your part, not that any of us were there to see it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_450<tab>カステッルム・マリヌムにて、
エメラルドウェポンの破壊に成功したと、伝令より聞き及んでいます！
ルビーウェポンの迎撃から始まった作戦も、いよいよ大詰めですね！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_451<tab>For that reason, we'd be grateful if you could give us a blow-by-blow account, if you wouldn't mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_451<tab>それでは、詳細な戦況をお聞かせ願えますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_452<tab>Good grief, it sounds like you had an awful lot to contend with! Rather you than me... Ahem! I shall add this to our ever-growing stack of reports, should anyone wish to review this information ahead of the next sortie.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_452<tab>ありがとうございます。
お伝えいただいた内容は、報告書にまとめて、上に提出いたします！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_453<tab>Now, if I may say so, it looks like your ordeals have taken their toll. We'll let you know if anything requires your attention, but until then, be sure to get some rest!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_RESISTANCEOFFICER_000_453<tab>それでは、作戦の遂行、お疲れさまでした！
何か動きがあるまで、お待ちください！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_454<tab>Meanwhile, in the VIIth Legion's correction chamber...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_454<tab>一方  ウェルリト・第VII軍団懲罰室――

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_455<tab>Three Weapons. Three pitiful displays of ineptitude...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_455<tab>3機目のウェポンが破壊され……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_455<tab>Aghhh!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_455<tab>グッ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_456<tab>To make matters worse, one of my prime candidates─your precious sister, no less─has escaped!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_456<tab>さらに、あの機体の操縦者候補だった妹にも逃げられた……ときた。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_456<tab>Unnngh!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_456<tab>ウゥ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_457<tab>And who should she go crawling to but that swine Gaius! After everything I've done t─<var 1A 02 /var>for<var 1A 01 /var> her, and this is how she repays me! As her older brother, it's your responsibility to instill some discipline in her, and you've failed miserably!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_457<tab>しかも、よりにもよって、ガイウスの下へ行くとはな。
まったく……誰にでも軽々しく尻を振る女だ。
兄であるキミが、ちゃんとしつけておかないからだぞォ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_458<tab>Well? Don't just stand there, boy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_458<tab>んん？
どうしたんだね？
次はキミの番だよ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_458<tab>Oh, of course! It's your first time, isn't it? Come along, there's no need to be shy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_458<tab>そうか！　キミは今日が初めてだったね！
大丈夫大丈夫、怖がることなんてないんだぞォ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_458<tab>You see, something wicked has taken hold of this young man, and it's our job to cleanse his troubled spirit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_458<tab>いま、このお兄さんは、
「ワルイモノ」に支配されそうになっているのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_300_458<tab>It may look painful, but it's the only way, I assure you. He'll be ever so grateful, and you want him to get better, don't you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_300_458<tab>だからこうして、私たちが、
お兄さんの中から「ワルイモノ」を追い出そうとしているんだよ。
キミだって、彼を助けたいと思うだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_400_458<tab>There's a good boy! Now, let's try again, shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_400_458<tab>うんうんッ！　そうだろうともッ！
なら、もう一度頑張ってみようかッ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_500_458<tab>Burn out the bad! Burn out the bad!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_500_458<tab>がーんばれ、がーんばれッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ELEZENBOY03980_600_458<tab>(-Elezen Ward-)B-Burn out the bad... Burn out the bad!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ELEZENBOY03980_600_458<tab>(-エレゼン族の少年-)が……がーんばれ、がーんばれッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_700_458<tab>(-Valens's Wards-)Burn out the bad! Burn out the bad!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_700_458<tab>(-ウァレンスと子どもたち-)がーんばれ、がーんばれッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_459<tab>Gaaaaaagh!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_459<tab>ぐあぁぁぁッ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_459<tab>Well done! You've all made Father proud. Very proud, indeed!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_459<tab>うん……うん……ッ！　よくできました……ッ！
みんな、本当に良くできた子どもたちだなァ……！
お義父さんは嬉しいぞォ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_459<tab>As for you...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_459<tab>それに引き換え、キミは……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_460<tab>I thought you were a cut above the rest of the savages, but it appears I was mistaken. And since you allowed that wretched sister of yours to escape, it falls to you to act as her replacement.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_460<tab>属州人の割に使える男だと思っていたが……
所詮は、愚鈍で汚らわしい蛮族に過ぎなかったようだなァ！
こうなれば、あの娘の代わりに、使い捨ての駒にしてやろうッ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_461<tab>I choose you as the next pilot, and your mission is simple: kill Gaius van Baelsar, whatever it takes. And if you so much as entertain the idea of betraying me again, I'll exterminate every last one of your kind...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_461<tab>あの機体で出撃し、ガイウスを殺せッ！
もしも、再び私を裏切るような真似をしてみろォ？
貴様の同胞どもは、ひとり残らず……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_461<tab>...like the vermin they are!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_461<tab>根・絶・や・し・だッ！！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_462<tab>Having said that, we will be forcibly initiating Oversoul using Zenos's combat data, so whatever schemes you may be hatching will never come to pass. All you need to do is sit back and let the synthetic auracite system do the work, with you as its conduit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_462<tab>……まァ、あれにはゼノスの戦闘データが搭載されている。
オーバーソウルモードの強制起動をかければ、負けることはない。
安心して、疑似聖石システムの贄となるがよいぞォ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_463<tab>You should thank me for allowing you to become part of my masterpiece. Your worthless existence will finally have some semblance of meaning!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_463<tab>残された短い人生、せいぜい謳歌するのだな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_463<tab>Hehehe...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_100_463<tab>ンフフフフフ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_100_463<tab>(-Valens's Second-in-command-)Lord Valens, preparations for the Oversoul trial are complete. We await your orders.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_100_463<tab>(-ウァレンスの副官-)ウァレンス様、
I号機のオーバーソウルモード起動試験のお時間です。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_463<tab>Splendid. There's never a dull moment around here!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_463<tab>ああ、そうだったそうだった！
わざわざすまないね、すぐに向かうとしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_300_463<tab>Now then, boys. Who'd like to see something special?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_300_463<tab>それじゃあ……キミと……

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_400_463<tab>Come along, everyone! Father has secrets to share with you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_400_463<tab>キミとキミ！
お義父さんについてきたまえ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_464<tab>This is my chance... And it's all thanks to the sacrifices made by my dear siblings. Finally, the Weapon will be mine to command.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_464<tab>こ、これでいい……
あとは、あの機体を奪って……計画を遂行する……。
そのために、兄妹たちが命を賭してくれたのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_465<tab>Once it has reached perfection, I will be unstoppable. First Valens...then the Empire itself will fall, and we will be free at last.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_465<tab>あれが喰えるのは、蛮神だけじゃない……。
究極の力を手に入れ、ウァレンスを……帝国を打ち倒す……。
そうすれば、同胞たちは自由になれる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_466<tab>Father...keep Allie safe.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_466<tab>義父上……
路上で拾っただけの私たちを、家族と呼んでくれるのなら……。
どうか、アリーを頼みます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_467<tab>Milisandia, Ricon, Rex... I'll see this through to the end. I promise.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_000_467<tab>ミリサンディア、リコン、レックス……
もうすぐ、すべてが終わる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_467<tab>Until then, watch over me.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_ALFONSE_100_467<tab>あと少しの間、そこから見守っていてくれ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_468<tab>So? Is it ready or not?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_468<tab>準備はできているか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_100_469<tab>The trial sequence has been primed, sir.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_100_469<tab>完了しております。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_469<tab>Then get on with it!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_200_469<tab>じゃ、始めよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_469<tab>Initiating synthetic auracite system. Loading Diamond Weapon simulation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_469<tab>疑似聖石システム、スタンバイ。
ダイヤウェポンの環境をロード。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_470<tab>Wh-What's going on!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_470<tab>ヒッ……いったい、何をどうすれば……！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_471<tab>You're helping us with a little research is all, ah...whatever your name is. The time has come for you to contribute to the glory of Garlemald!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_471<tab>いろいろと試してみたいことがあってねぇ。
キミ……ええっと、何という名前だったかな……？
ともかく、実験への献身的な協力に感謝するよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_472<tab>Th-This isn't what we agreed! You said th-that if I took part in the experiment, you'd let my f-family go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_472<tab>そ、そんなことより、約束を違えるなよ……！
貴様の実験とやらに付き合えば、家族を解放すると……！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_473<tab>You have Zenos's data loaded, yes? Activate Oversoul, and be quick about it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_473<tab>すでにゼノスのデータを入れてあるな？
オーバーソウルモードを発動させろ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_474<tab>Understood, Lord Valens.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_474<tab>了解。

source:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_475<tab>(-VIIth Legion Senior Engineer-)Galvus combat sample ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SYSTEM_000_475<tab>(-疑似聖石システム-)戦闘データ、コード「ゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァス」……スタンバイ。
生体コアの「上書き」を開始します。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_476<tab>Nnnaaaaaaggghhh!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_476<tab>ぐわぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！

source:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_477<tab>My...mind is... Nooo!
If this is...what it takes to...protect you both...I...
I love you! I'm so sorry...!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_477<tab>私の……心が……侵されていく……！！
だが……これで……家族だけは……！！
さらばだ……みんな……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_478<tab>Where...is my prey?
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_WERLYTPILOT03980_000_478<tab>狩りに……相応しい獲物は……どこだ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_479<tab>Organic core overwrite complete. Zenos yae Galvus data loaded.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_479<tab>ゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァスの人格に切り替わりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_480<tab>Enough. Shut it down!
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_480<tab>ふむ……実験を一時中断、システムを落とせ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_481<tab>Deactivating synthetic auracite system.
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_481<tab>疑似聖石システム、ダウン。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_482<tab>Hmm... The subject is instinctively bound to seek out prey, right from the outset. Regardless of the combat prowess it may boast, I need an obedient servant, not a ravenous beast.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_482<tab>開口一番に獲物を求めるとはね……。
いくら戦闘技能が十二分でも、この気まぐれさは、
兵器としての信頼性を低めかねないぞ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_483<tab>How revolting! And what a mess it makes of the cockpit.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_483<tab>それにしても、汚らわしい……
毎度、毎度、操縦席がダメになってしまうのも困りものだなぁ。
部品だってタダではないというのに。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_484<tab>Adjust the settings and prepare for another run! Fortunately, we have the next test subject ready and waiting...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_484<tab>まあいい、次だ、次だ……。
掃除が終わったら、パラメータを変えて実験を再開する。
そして、操縦席に座ってもらうのは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_485<tab>But sir, you agreed to release his family in exchange for his cooperation...
target: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_MECHANIC03980_000_485<tab>ですが、彼の家族は解放すると、先ほど約束を……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_486<tab>Ahahaha! Ahahahahahahaaaaaa!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_486<tab>あは…………あっはっはっはっは！！
あーっはっはっはっはっは！！！
ひーっひっひっひ……ひーっ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_487<tab>My, my! I never knew you had such a wonderful sense of humor! The great Valens van Varro, bargaining with savages? Ha! More fool him for trusting me in the first place!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALENSVANVARRO_000_487<tab>まったく、キミがそんなに面白い男だとは知らなかったぞぉ！
この私が、汚らわしい属州人と約束を交わすなどと……
最高のジョークじゃないかぁ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_490<tab>Leave Allie to me. Having cared for my mother for so long before being transferred away, I'd like to think I have developed suitable bedside manner.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SEVERA_000_490<tab>アリーのことは、私にお任せを……。
ガイウス様を信頼していないわけではないのだが、
年頃の少女のケアとなれば、同性の私の方がよかろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_495<tab>While I am painfully aware of the cruelty the Empire shows its enemies, even I am appalled to hear of how it treats its own. Warmachina that feed on the very lives of their pilots... I can scarcely imagine anything more heinous.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_VALDEAULIN_000_495<tab>ウェポン……戦いのたびに操縦者の命を吸うとは、
なんという非道な兵器なのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_500<tab>The majority of the VIIth Legion are sure to be stationed in the city of Werlyt, the heart of this occupied territory. Whether Alfonse is there with them remains to be seen.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_500<tab>おそらく、第VII軍団の主力は、
属州総督府が置かれた、ウェルリトの都にいるはずだ。
だが、そこにアルフォンスがいるとは限らない。

source: TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_505<tab>According to Allie, another Weapon lies in wait, but where, we do not know. It stands to reason however, that if we were to find it, Alfonse would surely not be far away.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYW301_03980_SHADOWHUNTER_000_505<tab>アリーによれば、まだウェポンは残っているそうだ。
となれば、依然、捜索の手を緩めるわけにはいかん。
